## Farming Philosophy

Sky Growers practices regenerative agriculture combining traditional heritage farming techniques with modern sustainable methods:
- Natural pest control
- Composting and soil health improvement
- Water conservation systems
- Crop rotation for soil fertility
- Pesticide-free growing methods
- Biodiversity enhancement
